thread.title: CT WFO ALBANY Warnings, Watches, and Advisories
thread.title_full: CT WFO ALBANY Warnings, Watches, and Advisories

author: Accuweather
title: CT WFO ALBANY Warnings, Watches, and Advisories
text:
WFO ALBANY Warnings, Watches and Advisories for Sunday, March 24, 2024
AREAL FLOOD WATCH
URGENT - IMMEDIATE BROADCAST REQUESTED
Flood Watch
National Weather Service Albany NY
430 AM EDT Fri Mar 22 2024
...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SATURDAY
NIGHT...
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible.
* WHERE...Portions of northwestern Connecticut, including the
following areas, Northern Litchfield and Southern Litchfield and
east central New York, including the following areas, Eastern
People are also readingâ€¦
Dutchess and Western Dutchess.
* WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Saturday night.
* IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers,
creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
- Around 2 inches of rain is expected Saturday through Saturday
night with locally higher amounts. This rainfall could
produce flooding in urban and poor drainage areas as well as
low lying areas. Some minor river flooding is also possible.
PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...
You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood
Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared
to take action should flooding develop.
